source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_00<tab>The haunted wrecks contain all manner of precious cargo, and Erapi Taropi believes he can find just the spice to take his soup from bland to grand.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_00<tab>船の墓場のエラピ・タロピは、スープを美味しくしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_01<tab>Forced to wait out the ongoing haunting of the Isles of Umbra, the reluctant looter Erapi Taropi busies himself with supper. While his fish chowder smells just fine to you, he would have you help him improve it all the same. Venture into the Ship Graveyard and bring back a handful of Far Eastern spices from an abandoned spice box.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_01<tab>スープに入れるスパイスが欲しいというエラピ・タロピ。船の墓場の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D0C01 /var>」を調べ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876C01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_02<tab>You have located the box and grabbed a handful of its contents. Are spices usually so squishy? They certainly do things differently in the Far East. Deliver the spices to Erapi Taropi's more capable hands.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876C01 /var>を入手した。船の墓場の「エラピ・タロピ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_03<tab>You hand the spices to Erapi Taropi, who discovers that they are a moldy mess...<var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> stirring them into the chowder. Your appetite departs abruptly at the smell, and poor Erapi Taropi begins to gloomily count his gil for fresh supplies.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_SEQ_03<tab>エラピ・タロピに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876C01 /var>を渡した。スパイスは、すっかり腐ってしまっていたようだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_TODO_00<tab>Collect Far Eastern spices from the spice box.
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_TODO_01<tab>Give the spices to Erapi Taropi.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_TODO_01<tab>エラピ・タロピに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_000<tab>Well, I'm certainly up a creek without an oar. <var 1A 02 /var>Easy<var 1A 01 /var> coin, they said. Waltz right in, grab the washed-up goods, then be on my way. “Everyone'll think you a ghost!” Bah! Might've worked 'cept for the <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> walkin'-dead spirits about.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_000まいったぜ、幽霊騒ぎに便乗して、
小銭稼ぎのつもりで島にやってきたんだが……。
……まさか、幽霊の正体がマジもんの死霊だったなんてよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_001<tab>'Tis a damn shame, but ain't nothin' worth rousin' the wrath o' them skeletons. All that booty up for grabs, but I got nothin' to grab but a ladle.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_001これから「船の墓場」に行って、
金目のものを物色しようと思ってたのに、
これじゃ仕事にならねぇぜ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_002<tab>...What? A man's gotta eat while he waits for restless spirits to go wanderin' elsewise. You look hungry yourself. Fancy some of this here chowder? Made it myself!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_002死霊がどっかに行くまで、腹ごしらえでもして
時間を潰そうかと思ったんだが……
魚のスープってのは、なかなか臭みがとれねぇな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_003<tab>Had nothin' to season it with but salt, though, so it's on the bland side. While I tend it, why don't you go to the Graveyard right quick and bring back spices? I saw some nice-lookin' Far Eastern stuff before I had to scarper on account of a phantom.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_003そうだ、確か漂着した船で「」を見かけたな。
あんた、ちょっと持ってきてくれよ。
飯ができたらわけてやっからさ。
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_DUMMY_000_000<tab>「船の墓場」のeobjにアクセスして「スパイス」をゲット。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_010<tab>You got 'em? Chowder's comin' along nice, like. I could always cook a fine chowder...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_010おう、待ってたぜ！
早く渡してくれよ、魚が煮崩れちまう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_020<tab>Aha! See, what'd I tell you? Knew they were there, I did. I'll just toss 'em right in, and this'll be a meal fit for an Admi─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_020そうそう、ありがとよ！
こいつを使えば、どんな魚も……
……うえッ、生臭ぇ！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_021<tab><sniff> Ugggh, this smells like <var 1A 02 /var>feet<var 1A 01 /var>! How long's that spice been left in the Graveyard, anyway? <sigh> Now I ain't got no supper, neither.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_021このスパイス、長年海水に浸かってたんだろうな。
完全に腐っちまってやがるぜ。
あーあ、せっかく料理した魚がパアだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_022<tab>I told 'em it were a bad idea. Easy money, they said. Sure will be...for the folk on this island. I'll have to pay 'em for more popotoes and cream.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC207_00966_ERAPITAROPI_000_022小銭稼ぎのつもりでこの島に来たってのに、
食費や何やらで大銭をなくしそうだぜ……。
